means: 创造( create的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Combined with other compounds, they created a massive dynamite-type bomb.
sentence.Network_cn: 将其与其他化合物结合，就制造出杀伤力极强的硝酸甘油炸弹。

sentence.Network_en: The uncertainty created by this situation must be confusing for you.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种局面所造成的不确定性肯定让你感到困惑。

sentence.Network_en: Legislation to that effect created fierce controversy both in Parliament and outside.
sentence.Network_cn: 那类立法在议会内外都引起了激烈的争论。

PerfectNetExp.abs: TPO词汇题_百度文库 ... debated 争辩 created 创造的 attributes 属性;归咎于.
supreme being , the ultimate warrior ... created to protect life ., 就能创造出最强的终极战士来保卫生命.
This section was created to assist and promote our members are running their own businesses ., 本节的设立是为那些运营自己企业的成员提供帮助和促进.
For you created my inmost being ; you knit me together in my mother ' s womb ., 我的肺腑是你所造的 . 我在母腹中 , 你已覆庇我.

entry.def: To create something means to cause it to happen or exist.

example.ex: We set business free to create more jobs in Britain...
example.tran: 我们放开对企业的限制以便在英国创造更多的就业机会。

example.ex: She could create a fight out of anything...

entry.def: When someone creates a new product or process, they invent it or design it.

example.ex: It is really great for a radio producer to create a show like this...
example.tran: 电台监制能够制作出这样的节目真是不简单。

example.ex: He's creating a whole new language of painting.
example.tran: 他正在创造一种全新的绘画语言。

auth_sentence.content: This album was created entirely by Jaime and Mike.
auth_sentence.res_content: This album was created entirely by Jaime and Mike.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This album was created entirely by Jaime and Mike.

auth_sentence.content: New material is then mutated or "created".
auth_sentence.res_content: New material is then mutated or "created".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: New material is then mutated or "created".

auth_sentence.content: Curvature can be created in a quantum space only.
auth_sentence.res_content: Curvature can be created in a quantum space only.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Curvature can be created in a quantum space only.

Sentence.sentence: All are guilty; and what a mess they have created.
New positions are constantly created that require people to keep learning.
On their way to creating a feminist paradise, the Swedes have unintentionally created a haven (避风港) for normal mortals.
The embargo (禁运) created panic in the West and caused oil prices to shoot up.
The effect of policies generating long-term resource concentration has also created a distinctive set of universities which are research-led and commercially active.
